#summary RunOneDaemon for Plugin Developers

RunOneDaemon contains 
 * scripts and code to execute one LOCKSS daemon 
 * which receives its configuiration settings from the MetaArchive cooperatives conspectus instances 
 * and which uses the plugins from this project's trunk to test harvest content 
 * details are given in the [http://educopia.googlecode.com/svn/branches/release/plugins_dev/run_one_daemon/README README] file

You can download it from /branches/release/plugins_dev/run_one_daemon/
 svn checkout http://educopia.googlecode.com/svn/branches/release/plugins_dev/run_one_daemon/

Then set it up according to the instructions in the README file that comes with run_one_daemon and read through the instructions about how to use it given in the README file as well.
